title: Live Weekly Roundup: Friday, May 20
description: A special live edition of the weekly roundup, with a look at Donald Trump's potential path to victory in the general election, what happened at the Nevada Democratic convention this past week, and the ongoing rifts in the Democratic party. This episode, White House correspondent Tamara Keith; campaign reporters Sam Sanders, Scott Detrow, Asma Khalid, and Sarah McCammon; congressional correspondent Susan Davis; political editor Domenico Montanaro; editor/correspondent Ron Elving. More coverage at nprpolitics.org. Email the show at nprpolitics@npr.org.
